scripts.dev: node ./src/lib/scripts/writePrisma.js qa && node ./src/lib/scripts/writeEnv.js local && pnpm prisma generate && vite dev
scripts.qa-push: node ./src/lib/scripts/validatePrisma.js qa && node ./src/lib/scripts/validateEnv.js qa && pnpm check && git push
scripts.qa-deploy: pnpm qa-write && pnpm prisma generate --data-proxy && pnpm check && pnpm build && pnpm wrangler publish --env qa
scripts.prod-push: node ./src/lib/scripts/validatePrisma.js production && node ./src/lib/scripts/validateEnv.js production && pnpm check && git push
scripts.prod-deploy: pnpm prod-write && pnpm prisma generate --data-proxy && pnpm check pnpm build && pnpm wrangler publish
scripts.schema: pnpm qa-write && pnpm prisma db push
scripts.studio: pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma studio
